Events
The Grind at GenX Tavern
Saturday August 30th
Sunday may 8th
Every Saturday
MTV's
The Grind
taught a generation how to dance and we're keeping your booty shaking and hands waving as we bring that energy to Downtown Tampa at
GenX Tavern
every Saturday Night!
The Grind
features some of Tampa's best DJ's like
DJ Chris Craze, Matt The Bratt, DJ Matt Dodge
and more spinning an uptempo party mix of classic 80s and 90s jams mashed up with some current pop hits.
08:00 PM - 01:00 AM
2025-08-30 20:00:00
2025-08-30 01:00:00
America/New_York
The Grind at GenX Tavern
MTV's The Grind taught a generation how to dance and we're keeping your booty shaking and hands waving as we bring that energy to Downtown Tampa at GenX Tavern every Saturday Night!  The Grind features some of Tampa's best DJ's like DJ Chris Craze, Matt The Bratt, DJ Matt Dodge and more spinning an uptempo party mix of classic 80s and 90s jams mashed up with some current pop hits.
GenX Tavern
GenX Tavern
contactus@genxtavern.com

Sunday may 8th
Every Monday
Get your team together, head downtown and win some awesome prizes while enjoying great food and drinks every Monday for T
rivia Night at GenX Tavern
with
Events Done Right
!
Tampa's best
Trivia Night
kicks off at 7pm so bring your pop culture knowledge and compete for the trophy!

Monday Night Trivia
Get your team together, head downtown and win some awesome prizes while enjoying great food and drinks every Monday for Trivia Night at GenX Tavern with Events Done Right!  Tampa's best Trivia Night kicks off at 7pm so bring your pop culture knowledge and compete for the trophy!
GenX Tavern
GenX Tavern
contactus@genxtavern.com
Wednesday Night Karaoke!
Wednesday September 3rd
Sunday may 8th
Every Wednesday
Get ready to sing your heart out at
GenX Tavern’s Wednesday Night Karaoke
with
Events Done Right
, kicking off tonight at 7:00 PM!
Whether you’re a seasoned performer or just looking to have some fun, grab the mic and belt out your favorite hits—from 80s anthems and 90s throwbacks to today’s chart-toppers!
All music genres welcome  Drink specials all night  Good vibes, great crowd, and non-stop entertainment
GenX Tavern
| 103 East Jackson Street, Downtown Tampa  No cover | All ages welcome
07:00 PM - 11:00 PM
2025-09-03 19:00:00
2025-09-03 23:00:00
America/New_York

Get ready to sing your heart out at GenX Tavern’s Wednesday Night Karaoke with Events Done Right, kicking off tonight at 7:00 PM! Whether you’re a seasoned performer or just looking to have some fun, grab the mic and belt out your favorite hits—from 80s anthems and 90s throwbacks to today’s chart-toppers!  All music genres welcome  Drink specials all night  Good vibes, great crowd, and non-stop entertainment  GenX Tavern | 103 East Jackson Street, Downtown Tampa  No cover | All ages welcome

GiRLs night OUT
Thursday September 4th
Sunday may 8th
Every Thursday
It’s GiRLs Night OUT at GenX Tavern!
Grab your crew and head to Downtown Tampa every Thursday for the ultimate throwback party! We’re spinning the best pop hits from the 80s, 90s, 2000s, and today — everything from Britney to Beyoncé, Spice Girls to Sabrina.       *2-for-1 drinks for ladies from 8PM–10PM  *Pop anthems all night long     103 E Jackson St – right in the heart of downtown
Let’s dance, sip, and sing like it’s girls night every night!
08:00 PM - 12:00 AM
2025-09-04 20:00:00
2025-09-04 00:00:00
America/New_York

Too Fresh Fridays
Friday September 5th
Sunday may 8th
Every Friday
Kick off the weekend with
Too Fresh Fridays at GenX Tavern
!   Join us in downtown Tampa for a night of old-school rap and classic
party jamz, guaranteed to keep you moving from 8 PM to 1 AM.    Special guest DJs spin the hottest throwbacks and legendary beats that defined an era. Whether you’re vibing at the bar or hitting the dance floor, this is the spot to relive the days of the best of hip-hop and party anthems.    No cover – just good vibes, great drinks, and timeless music. Pull up, bring your crew, and get fresh!
08:00 PM - 01:00 AM
2025-09-05 20:00:00
2025-09-05 01:00:00
America/New_York

Gen X

slideshow start stop playing
Gen X
Tavern
End Section 1
Start Section 2
About us
Located in Downtown Tampa, Gen X Tavern was created for people who take their food and drink seriously, but not themselves.
Our restaurant bar is full of nostalgia that will remind you of some of the best times of your life, all while you enjoy some classic treats with a current influence. We have that Modern Fare with Retro Flair! Decked out in the fads of yesteryear with a contemporary twist, we pay homage to a period of time - that if you were there - was both awesome and a beautiful disaster. Hello, 80's and 90's. Our jeans may be a little tighter and dance moves funkier, but at the end of the day we've all got something in common. Let the good times roll.
End Section 2
Start Section 4 Custom section
Gen X Tavern honors 80's and 90's style, swagger, and unflinching character. It almost feels like you've been here before, because you have... if not literally, certainly figuratively.
Welcome to your new favorite restaurant and neighborhood bar! Located in Downtown Tampa, Florida, blocks from Curtis Hixon Park, Amalie Arena and The Tampa Riverwalk, our dining area is decked out with nostalgic decor while our food and drink menu is inspired by currently popular and timeless dishes. We have the Modern Fare with Retro Flair!
End  Section 4 Custom section
Start Section 3

by phone

contactus@genxtavern.com
End Section 3
